Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Interfaces
  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Enums
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    org.gradle.api.tasks.ConventionValue
    Use Closure or Callable instead.
    org.gradle.tooling.model.eclipse.EclipseTask
    org.gradle.api.tasks.testing.TestLogging
    use TestLogging instead
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    org.gradle.api.tasks.compile.Compile
    This class has been replaced by JavaCompile.
    org.gradle.RefreshOptions
    Use StartParameter.setRefreshDependencies(boolean) instead.
    org.gradle.api.plugins.ReportingBasePluginConvention
    This convention has been deprecated and replaced by ReportingExtension
  • Deprecated Enums 
    Enum and Description
    org.gradle.CacheUsage
    This enum has been deprecated. Use StartParameter.isRerunTasks() and StartParameter.isRecompileScripts() instead.
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    org.gradle.api.plugins.GroovyBasePlugin.GROOVY_CONFIGURATION_NAME
    Typically, usages of groovy can simply be replaced with compile. In some cases, it may be necessary to additionally configure the groovyClasspath property of GroovyCompile and Groovydoc tasks.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.gradle.api.tasks.TaskContainer.add(Map)
    use TaskContainer.create(java.util.Map) instead
    org.gradle.api.tasks.TaskContainer.add(Map, Closure)
    use TaskContainer.create(java.util.Map, groovy.lang.Closure) instead
    org.gradle.api.tasks.TaskContainer.add(String)
    use TaskContainer.create(String) instead
    org.gradle.api.artifacts.ConfigurationContainer.add(String)
    use NamedDomainObjectContainer.create(String) instead
    org.gradle.api.tasks.SourceSetContainer.add(String)
    use NamedDomainObjectContainer.create(String) instead
    org.gradle.api.plugins.ExtensionContainer.add(String, Class, Object...)
    use ExtensionContainer.create(java.lang.String, java.lang.Class<T>, java.lang.Object...)
    org.gradle.api.tasks.TaskContainer.add(String, Class)
    use TaskContainer.create(String, Class) instead
    org.gradle.api.tasks.TaskContainer.add(String, Closure)
    use TaskContainer.create(String, groovy.lang.Closure) instead
    org.gradle.api.artifacts.ConfigurationContainer.add(String, Closure)
    use NamedDomainObjectContainer.create(String, groovy.lang.Closure) instead
    org.gradle.api.tasks.SourceSetContainer.add(String, Closure)
    use NamedDomainObjectContainer.create(String, groovy.lang.Closure) instead
    org.gradle.api.artifacts.ArtifactRepositoryContainer.addLast(Object)
    Use maven(groovy.lang.Closure) or ArtifactRepositoryContainer.add(ArtifactRepository) instead.
    org.gradle.api.artifacts.ArtifactRepositoryContainer.addLast(Object, Closure)
    Use maven(groovy.lang.Closure) or ArtifactRepositoryContainer.add(ArtifactRepository) instead.
    org.gradle.api.Project.childrenDependOnMe()
    Use Task.dependsOn(Object...) instead.
    org.gradle.plugins.binaries.model.CompileSpec.compile()
    No replacement
    org.gradle.api.Project.dependsOn(String)
    Use Task.dependsOn(Object...) instead.
    org.gradle.api.Project.dependsOn(String, boolean)
    Use Task.dependsOn(Object...) instead.
    org.gradle.api.Project.dependsOnChildren()
    Use Task.dependsOn(Object...) instead.
    org.gradle.api.Project.dependsOnChildren(boolean)
    To definde task dependencies use Task.dependsOn(Object...) instead. For declaring evaluation dependencies to child projects, use evaluation dependencies use Project.evaluationDependsOnChildren().
    org.gradle.api.Script.fileTree(Closure)
    Use Script.fileTree(Object,Closure) instead.
    org.gradle.api.Project.fileTree(Closure)
    Use Project.fileTree(Object,Closure) instead.
    org.gradle.api.plugins.ReportingBasePluginConvention.getApiDocTitle()
    use ReportingExtension.getApiDocTitle()
    org.gradle.StartParameter.getCacheUsage()
    Use StartParameter.isRecompileScripts() and/or StartParameter.isRerunTasks() instead.
    org.gradle.api.tasks.compile.CompileOptions.getCompiler()
    use CompileOptions.forkOptions.executable instead
    org.gradle.api.tasks.SourceTask.getDefaultSource()
    Use getSource() instead.
    org.gradle.api.tasks.AbstractCopyTask.getDefaultSource()
    Use getSource() instead.
    org.gradle.api.artifacts.ExcludeRule.getExcludeArgs()
    Use ExcludeRule.getGroup() or ExcludeRule.getModule() instead.
    org.gradle.api.tasks.bundling.Compression.getExtension()
    Use Compression.getDefaultExtension() instead.
    org.gradle.api.artifacts.UnresolvedDependency.getId()
    org.gradle.api.tasks.compile.CompileOptions.getIncludeJavaRuntime()
    No replacement
    org.gradle.StartParameter.getMergedSystemProperties() 
    org.gradle.api.tasks.compile.CompileOptions.getOptimize()
    No replacement
    org.gradle.plugins.binaries.model.Binary.getProject()
    No replacement
    org.gradle.StartParameter.getRefreshOptions()
    Use StartParameter.isRefreshDependencies() instead.
    org.gradle.api.plugins.ReportingBasePluginConvention.getReportsDir()
    use ReportingExtension.getBaseDir()
    org.gradle.api.plugins.ReportingBasePluginConvention.getReportsDirName()
    use ReportingExtension.getBaseDir()
    org.gradle.api.artifacts.ResolvedArtifact.getResolvedDependency()
    An artifact can belong to multiple dependencies. Use ResolvedArtifact.getModuleVersion() instead.
    org.gradle.api.artifacts.ArtifactRepositoryContainer.getResolvers()
    No replacement.
    org.gradle.api.tasks.scala.ScalaCompileOptions.getTargetCompatibility()
    use AbstractCompile.getTargetCompatibility() instead
    org.gradle.api.tasks.compile.GroovyCompileOptions.isIncludeJavaRuntime()
    No replacement
    org.gradle.api.tasks.compile.CompileOptions.isIncludeJavaRuntime()
    No replacement
    org.gradle.StartParameter.isNoOpt()
    Use StartParameter.isRerunTasks() instead.
    org.gradle.api.tasks.compile.CompileOptions.isOptimize()
    No replacement
    org.gradle.api.tasks.compile.GroovyCompileOptions.isStacktrace()
    No replacement
    org.gradle.api.tasks.compile.GroovyCompileOptions.isUseAnt()
    No replacement
    org.gradle.api.tasks.compile.CompileOptions.isUseAnt()
    No replacement
    org.gradle.StartParameter.setCacheUsage(CacheUsage)
    Use StartParameter.setRecompileScripts(boolean) and/or StartParameter.setRerunTasks(boolean) instead.
    org.gradle.api.tasks.compile.CompileOptions.setCompiler(String)
    use CompileOptions.forkOptions.executable instead
    org.gradle.api.tasks.compile.GroovyCompileOptions.setIncludeJavaRuntime(boolean)
    No replacement
    org.gradle.api.tasks.compile.CompileOptions.setIncludeJavaRuntime(boolean)
    No replacement
    org.gradle.StartParameter.setNoOpt(boolean)
    Use StartParameter.setRefreshDependencies(boolean) instead.
    org.gradle.api.tasks.compile.CompileOptions.setOptimize(boolean)
    No replacement
    org.gradle.StartParameter.setRefreshOptions(RefreshOptions)
    Use StartParameter.setRefreshDependencies(boolean) instead.
    org.gradle.api.plugins.ReportingBasePluginConvention.setReportsDirName(String)
    use ReportingExtension.setBaseDir(Object)
    org.gradle.api.tasks.compile.GroovyCompileOptions.setStacktrace(boolean)
    No replacement
    org.gradle.api.tasks.scala.ScalaCompileOptions.setTargetCompatibility(String)
    use AbstractCompile.setTargetCompatibility(java.lang.String) instead
    org.gradle.api.tasks.compile.GroovyCompileOptions.setUseAnt(boolean)
    No replacement
    org.gradle.api.tasks.compile.CompileOptions.setUseAnt(boolean)
    No replacement
    org.gradle.StartParameter.useEmptySettingsScript()
    use StartParameter.useEmptySettings()
